VVD-1.scenarioPattern: Verify step Then I verify assertions matching '.+'

VVD-2.assertionPattern: .*\[Expected: a value equal to <5> Actual: <4> was less than <5>\]

VVD-3.assertionPattern: .*Different value found (when comparing expected array element|in node).*
VVD-3.scenarioPattern: Known issues should be detected and matched for separate JSON assertions

VVD-4.scenarioPattern: Known issues should be detected and matched for separate JSON assertions

VVD-5.assertionPattern: HTTP response body is not present
